nodes.text: Velker was the name of a type of starfighter used by the Lok Revenants.
From the front, the Velker had a thin cross-section, as it was essentially one long wing. The fighter was equipped with three engines, four laser cannons, and required a single pilot.
The pirate Nym acquired several of these fighters for his band, the Lok Revenants. They flew as his wingmates during multiple skirmishes including a raid on Lok.
This fighter appeared in Star Wars: Starfighter as an NPC ally character.
